```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r input_data}
pols_df = read_csv("pols-month.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  separate(mon, "-",into = c("year","month","day")) |> 
  mutate(
    month = as.character(month),
    month = case_match(
      month, 
      month = "01" ~ "Jan",
      month = "02" ~ "Feb",
      month = "03" ~ "Mar",
      month = "04" ~ "Apr",
      month = "05" ~ "May",
      month = "06" ~ "Jun",
      month = "07" ~ "Jul",
      month = "08" ~ "Aug",
      month = "09" ~ "Sep",
      month = "10" ~ "Oct", 
      month = "11" ~ "Nov", 
      month = "12" ~ "Dec",
    )
  )

umploy_df = read_csv("unemployment.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names()

snp_df = read_csv("snp.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names()
```
